content.rendered:
On February 13, 5 AM UTC, we had an AMA session with Origin Protocol, the blockchain platform for building decentralized marketplaces at our AMA session on Telegram! The project will be represented by Kay Yoo, Business Ops & Finance, and Anna Wang, Regional Manager, Greater China.

The rules are:

  • Learn about the project we’re hosting
  • Join the live session in our Telegram chat
  • Pass the quiz (link to google forms will be shared at the AMA)
  • Take part in the live chat with Origin Protocol

The pool for the AMA with Origin Protocol is $700 OGN.

  • $490 for all quiz participants, who pass it successfully
  • $210 will be shared between 5-10 users who ask the best questions on Twitter or in the live chat.

To pass the quiz – learn about Origin Protocol.

Download Atomic wallet to get OGN-address!

Subscribe to our Twitter:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Origin Protocol

Subscribe to Telegram channels:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Origin Protocol

The Google forms will be sent during the session in our Telegram chat. Don’t miss it out!

excerpt.rendered: On February 13, 5 AM UTC, we’ll have Origin Protocol, the blockchain platform for building decentralized marketplaces at our AMA session on Telegram! The project will be represented by Kay Yoo, Business Ops & Finance, and Anna Wang, Regional Manager, Greater China.
